form.title: Booking Form
form.bookingTypeTitle: What type of booker are you?
form.bookingLeisureBusiness: Is your group staying for Business or Leisure?

booking.title: Booking Details
booking.description: Our team will try to accommodate your group’s preferences in terms of hotels and dates. If that’s not possible, we’ll do everything we can to offer the best alternatives.
booking.schoolTrip: Please tick this box if you are booking for a school or youth group.
booking.reasonTitle: What is the reason for your group's visit?
booking.packageDescription: Subject to availability. Room only not available for group bookings.

rooms.title: Rooms
rooms.description: Select the maximum number of rooms required by room type and occupancy.
rooms.aditionalDes1: Let us know if you have any additional information or special requests
rooms.aditionalDes2: If you do not require the same number of rooms on each night of your stay, please state below the number and type of rooms required each night.

errors.email: Please enter a valid email address
errors.phone: Please enter a valid phone number
